sentence: “Just having time to spend time with what you don’t know, and figure it out and get through those hoops, is huge,” said center Brian Allen, who spent a year as understudy to veteran John Sullivan after being drafted in the fourth round in 2018, and wound up anchoring the Rams’ offensive line in 2021.
author: Kevin Modesti
title: Rams’ draft approach requires rookies to develop one key trait – patience

sentence: With Whitworth gone after 16 years in the league, Havenstein (seven years) is the dean of the line, followed by Noteboom and center Brian Allen (four).
author: Kevin Modesti
title: Rams could have a lot on the line in NFL draft
